Sqls.Sql: SELECT [proj_code] '项目代码' ,[proj_name] as '项目名称' ,[proj_port] as '部署端口' ,[proj_note] as '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_Project]
SELECT [proj_code] ,[proj_name] ,[proj_port] FROM [dbo].[HA_Project] where proj_code='#proj_code#'

SELECT top 50 b.[proj_name] '项目名称' ,a.[proj_code] '项目代码' ,a.[intf_name] '接口名称' ,a.[intf_code] '接口代码' ,a.[intf_namespace] '命名空间' ,a.[intf_version] '接口版本' ,a.[intf_auth] '接口作者' ,a.[intf_dbconn] '数据库连接' ,a.[intf_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_Interface] a left join [dbo].[HA_Project] b on a.proj_code=b.proj_code

SELECT b.[proj_name] '项目名称' ,a.[proj_code] '项目代码' ,a.[intf_name] '接口名称' ,a.[intf_code] '接口代码' ,a.[intf_namespace] '命名空间' ,a.[intf_version] '接口版本' ,a.[intf_auth] '接口作者' ,a.[intf_dbconn] '数据库连接' ,a.[intf_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_Interface] a left join [dbo].[HA_Project] b on a.proj_code=b.proj_code where a.proj_code='#proj_code#'

SELECT b.[proj_name] ,a.[proj_code] ,a.[intf_name] ,a.[intf_code] ,a.[intf_namespace] ,a.[intf_version] ,a.[intf_auth] ,a.[intf_dbconn] FROM [dbo].[HA_Interface] a left join [dbo].[HA_Project] b on a.proj_code=b.proj_code where a.proj_code='#proj_code#'

SELECT [conn_id] '序号' ,[conn_name] '连接名称' ,[conn_IP] '服务器IP' ,[conn_Account] '账号' ,[conn_Password] '密码' ,[conn_DBType] '数据库类型' ,[conn_Alias] 'DB名称' ,[conn_CType] '连接类型' ,[conn_String] '连接字符串' ,[conn_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_Connection]
select count(*) from dbo.ha_interface where intf_dbconn ='#conn_name#'
SELECT [conn_name] ,[conn_IP] ,[conn_Account] ,[conn_Password] ,[conn_DBType] ,[conn_Alias] ,[conn_CType] ,[conn_String] FROM [dbo].[HA_Connection] where conn_name='#conn_name#'

SELECT [intf_code] '接口代码' ,[m_name] '方法名称' ,[m_code] '方法编号' ,[m_desc] '描述' --,[m_reqtype] '请求类型' ,[m_template] '模版类型(枚举)' ,[m_version] '方法版本' ,[m_funcode] '代码(SQL)' ,[m_isencrypted] '返回内容是否加密' ,[m_arggrpcode] 'agcode' ,[m_rtnvaluecode] 'rtnvalcode' ,[m_pagesize] '分页大小' FROM [dbo].[HA_Method]

SELECT [intf_code] '接口代码' ,[m_name] '方法名称' ,[m_code] '方法编号' ,[m_desc] '描述' --,[m_reqtype] '请求类型' ,[m_template] '模版类型(枚举)' ,[m_version] '方法版本' ,[m_funcode] '代码(SQL)' ,[m_isencrypted] '返回内容是否加密' ,[m_arggrpcode] 'agcode' ,[m_rtnvaluecode] 'rtnvalcode' ,[m_pagesize] '分页大小' FROM [dbo].[HA_Method] where [intf_code] = '#intf_code#'

SELECT [intf_code] ,[m_name] ,[m_code] ,[m_desc] ,[m_reqtype] ,[m_template] ,[m_version] ,[m_funcode] ,[m_isencrypted] ,[m_arggrpcode] ,[m_rtnvaluecode] ,[m_pagesize] FROM [dbo].[HA_Method] where [intf_code] = '#intf_code#'
SELECT [ag_code] '代码' ,[ag_name] '组名' ,[ag_paras] '所有参数的代码 逗号分隔' ,[ag_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup]
SELECT [ag_code] ,[ag_name] ,[ag_paras] FROM [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] where ag_code = '#ag_code#'
SELECT [para_code] '代码' ,[para_name] '名称' ,[para_datatype] '数据类型' ,[para_length] '最大长度' ,[para_default] '默认值(用于测试方法)' ,[para_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_Parameter]

SELECT [para_code] '代码' ,[para_name] '名称' ,[para_datatype] '数据类型' ,[para_length] '最大长度' ,[para_default] '默认值(用于测试方法)' ,[para_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_Parameter] a left join [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] b on a.para_code in (select col from dbo.split((select i.ag_paras from [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] i where i.ag_code='#ag_code#')+',' ,',')) where b.ag_code='#ag_code#'

SELECT [para_code] ,[para_name] ,[para_datatype] ,[para_length] ,[para_default] FROM [dbo].[HA_Parameter] a left join [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] b on a.para_code in (select col from dbo.split((select i.ag_paras from [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] i where i.ag_code='#ag_code#')+',' ,',')) where b.ag_code='#ag_code#'

SELECT count([para_code]) totalnum FROM [dbo].[HA_Parameter] a left join [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] b on a.para_code in (select col from dbo.split((select i.ag_paras from [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] i where i.ag_code='#ag_code#')+',' ,',')) where b.ag_code='#ag_code#' group by b.ag_code

SELECT count(a.para_code) '用到这个参数的参数组个数' FROM [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] b left join [dbo].[HA_Parameter] a on a.para_code in (select col from dbo.split((select i.ag_paras from [dbo].[HA_ArgGroup] i where i.ag_code='#ag_code#')+',' ,',')) where b.ag_code='#ag_code#' where a.para_code='#para_code#'
SELECT [rv_name] '类名称' ,[rv_JSON] 'JSON串(类定义)' ,[rv_exttype] '继承类型' ,[rv_note] '备注' FROM [dbo].[HA_RetValObject]
select count(*) from dbo.ha_method where m_rtnvaluecode = '#rv_name#'
select count(*) from dbo.ha_method where m_arggrpcode = '#ag_code#'
